All Classes

Class Description
AccessDialogController
Abstract access controller.
AccessDialogViewer<Controller extends AccessDialogController>
Class responsible for showing access dialogs.
ActiveUser
Component responsible for maintaining the information about the currently logged-in user.
Admin
This class represents the admin of the application.
AlleviationApplication
This application provides functionalities for a cinema multiplex.
CinemaApp
Class responsible for Spring Boot context creation and JavaFx application launch
Customer
This class represents the customer of the cinema.
CustomerRepository
Customer repository, might be later changed to a specialization of user repository.
DataLoader
This class is responsible for populating the database with sample data at the start of the application.
EditDialogController<T>
Abstraction for EditDialogControllers - responsible for both adding a new element to the database as well as updating an existing one.
EditHallDialogController
Controller responsible for modal with hall editing
EditMovieDialogController
Controller responsible for modal with movie editing
EditSeanceDialogController
Controller responsible for modal with seance editing
EditUserDialogController
Controller responsible for modal with user editing
EntityObject
An abstraction for all database Entities.
EntityObject.Columns
The type Columns.
EntityObjectService<E extends EntityObject,​R extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<E,​java.lang.Integer>>
Base class for all services.
GenericController
Base class for non-modal controllers
GenericListController<Item extends EntityObject>
Abstraction for ListControllers - responsible for displaying lists of specific EntityObjects.
Genre
This class represents movie genres.
Genre.Columns
The type Columns.
GenreRepository
A repository for the movie genres.
Hall
Class responsible for representation of cinema hall.
Hall.Columns
The type Columns.
HallListController
Controller responsible for displaying list of halls and control panel, which allows to manipulate them (only adding at the moment)
HallRepository
Repository of cinema halls.
HallService
Service responsible for manipulating the hall repository.
ItemDialogContext<Item,​Controller extends EditDialogController<Item>>
The type Item dialog context.
LoginDialogController
Controller responsible for user's login.
MainController
Controller responsible for displaying splash screen (empty at the moment)
MenuController
Controller responsible for management of the navigation bar.
Movie
This class is responsible for storing information about movies.
Movie.Columns
The type Columns.
MovieListController
The type Movie list controller.
MovieRepository
The interface Movie repository.
MovieService
Service responsible for manipulating the movie repository.
MovieStats
Specialized movie statistics.
ObservableComposite
Composite of all ObservableLists of the ListControllers.
Order
Class responsible for representation of customer's orders.
Order.Columns
The type Columns.
OrderRepository
Repository of cutomer's orders.
OrderService
Service responsible for manipulating order and ticket repositories.
RegistrationDialogController
Controller responsible for user's registration.
Screen
Enum representing navigable screens in application
ScreenSwitcher
Class responsible for keeping root panes for each navigable screen in application and switching them accordingly
Seance
Class responsible for representation of a movie's seance.
Seance.Columns
The type Columns.
SeanceListController
The type Seance list controller.
SeanceRepository
Repository of seances.
SeanceService
Service responsible for manipulating the seance repository.
ServiceManager
Provides logic and abstraction of Controller-Service-ObservableList communication.
StageAndSceneSetupper
Helper class responsible for setting up a stage and a scene.
Stats
This class will be responsible for collecting the statistics and providing them for other services.
Ticket
Class responsible for representation of a ticket.
Ticket.Columns
The type Columns.
TicketRepository
Repository of tickets.
TicketService
Stub of service for manipulating Ticket repository
TimeStats
Specialized time statistic (may include popularity of seances during certain times of day of days of the week).
User
This abstract class represents any user of the system.
User.Columns
The type Columns.
UserListController
Controller responsible for displaying list of users and control panel, which allows to manipulate them (only adding at the moment)
UserRepository
Repository of users.
UserService
Service responsible for manipulating the user repository.
UserStats
Specialized user statistics.
UserType
This enum represents different types of user.
ValidatingController
Abstract controller using validation methods.
ViewControllerManager
ViewControllerManager is responsible for setting up the controllers of the application.
Worker
This class represents the worker of the cinema.
